Description:
Model
Brand: ORICO
Series: ORICO J10
Model: ORICO J10
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Memory Components: 3D NAND
Interface: PCIe NVMe Gen3 x4


Features
Features: 1. High-performance NVMe SSD with read speeds up to 3100 MB/s and write speeds up to 1900 MB/s, utilizing PCIe Gen3 x4 technology.
2. Ensured reliability and stability through 96 hours of rigorous testing, including sleep tests, read/write tests, high-temperature tests, and performance tests.
3. Compatible with PS5, PCs, and laptops, featuring M.2 2280 form factor and S.M.A.R.T. function support for efficient operation.
4. Equipped with a pre-installed aluminum heatspreader to dissipate heat and prevent throttling, ensuring sustained high performance.
5. Backed by a 5-year limited warranty, providing peace of mind and support for any product-related inquiries.


Package Content
Package Content: 1 x ORICO NVMe SSD
1 x  Cooling vest
1 x  Thermal conductive silicone pad 
1 x User manual
Label: SSD M.2 Orico 1TB J-10
